title: Vin Diesel karaoke and Boyhood's Cathood spoof â it's today's pop culture live | Culture | The Guardian
summary: back from lunch , found kit harrington with short hair .

documents.title: that 's all , folks
text: have a marvellous weekend whatever you 're up to .
and if you 're undecided , here 's where you can rave your face off across the uk .
back on monday !

documents.title: tomorrow 's guide , today !
text: is n't she a beauty ?

it 's our edinburgh special , featuring a guide to what the standups will be riffing on this year , as chosen by the festival 's top talkers ; an interview switcharoo between romesh ranganathan and seann walsh ; an interview with bj novak ; an ode to edinburgh by will adamsdale and so much more .
get it and you 'll have the last laugh .
or something .

documents.title: captain twerk
text: call us fickle but has n't this trend for getting slebs to sing other people 's songs , like a crap hollywood version of radio 1 's live lounge , got a little out of hand ?

step forward exhibit f , william shatner crooning his way through queen latifah 's ladies first like it was never a powerful feminist anthem and always the sort of thing you might hear on a cruise ship sailing to bournemouth .
enough !

documents.title: behold , tara reid 's branding brilliance
text: a splash or taradise .
/tara reid perfumes are bigger business than box office hits these days just ask j.lo .
so it makes total sense that , off the back of the critical success of the sharknado franchise , tara reid should launch her own fishy fragrance , too .
we were hoping that this was a joke but according to jezebel it 's not .
what ever happened to having a themed happy meal ?
while we 're here , let 's take another look at that trailer , shall we¦

documents.title: back from lunch , found kit harrington with short hair
text: war !
literature !
bustles !

this new kit harington vehicle , testament of youth , an adaptation of vera brittain 's 1933 novel , could n't be more british if it featured benedict cumberbatch in pantaloons snivelling about the weather .
here 's the trailer .

documents.title: lunchtime links
text: 1// here 's vin diesel 's rendition of sam smith 's stay with me , complete with irksome presenter and further proof that diesel 's talent stretches far beyond looking ripped in a pair of wraparound shades .
2// if you like that , how about this interview with him about his love for trees ?
3// kendrick lamarr probably is n't so into trees but he has made a short film inspired by himself .
talk about a smooth segue , there .
4// meanwhile , lorde is fast becoming pop music 's answer to katniss .
as her world domination gathers pace , she 's now to curate all of the music for the next hunger games film .
5// for more music heavyweights , we 're livestreaming america 's lollapalooza festival from 8pm tonight and every evening this weekend .
fingers on the mouse to see live sets from arctic monkeys , outkast and kings of leon .

documents.title: # reviewanything is here !
text: shaw our crack team of critics have once again reviewed your submissions , from new music and standup to , erm , a drawing of a sofa .

documents.title: deadmau5 , rob ford and five shots of espresso
text: what happens when edm 's answer to frank sidebottom goes on a coffee run with disgraced canadian politician rob ford ?
thirty minutes of solid gold caffeine-fuelled chat including insights on football ( i love football .
it 's cool . )
and how to chill when you 're famous ( i talk to my celebrity friends and i say , what do these people think we do ?
we just play risk or monopoly , like normal people .
) , that 's what .
you can watch the rest of deadmau5 's coffee run series here .

documents.title: meanwhile , outside the kings landing job centre¦
text: ¦ it 's aimee richardson , who played myrcella baratheon in game of thrones .
the actress posted this vine reaction to the news that she has been recast in the next series as it prepares to go deeper into dorne .

documents.title: it 's never too early to jack
text: we 're big fans of deep house producer maya jane coles here at the guide so imagine our gleeful faces at the arrival of a new tune , taken from her new mix for london club fabric 's esteemed compilation series .
starts off cosmically , gets a bit garage-y , ends ty gracefully .
like that loads ?
find out more about maya in our interview with her .

documents.title: horse , bitch !
text: icymi , some very exciting telly news from yesterday eve .

this is what happens when breaking bad 's aaron paul and arrested development 's will arnett do an animation about a horse-who-is-actually-a-failed-90s-sitcom-star : new netflix show , bojack horseman .
watch the trailer for it here .

documents.title: friday kittens
text: morning everyone .
k-hutch here .
we 'll be coming at you with our weekly review anything column very soon but first , the feline spoof trailer of richard linklater 's boyhood .
it 's actually terrible .
but look , kittens !

bulletin.text: Join us for frivolous live blogging frolics, updated throughout the day.
Everything you need to know about pop culture this Friday, from new music to film trailers and funnies.
Plus #ReviewAnything is back! Tweet us your submissions @twitterid.
